Visit to Kids Mondo at Mall of Qatar
4  February,  2024
In line with documenting avenues of cooperation with various state institutions in both the public and private sectors, in a manner that realizes the vision and mission of the Best Buddies Qatar initiative, the Preparatory Stage Chapter (Girls) organized a visit to the entertainment city (Kids Mondo) at Mall of Qatar. The visit was attended by 40 female participants (from both categories) from Al-Aqsa Preparatory School for Girls and Hind bint Amr Al-Ansariyyah Preparatory School for Girls. The aim of the visit was to familiarize the participants with the nature of various professions and jobs such as doctors, paramedics, and traffic police, within a social and entertaining atmosphere that enhances social integration among the participants from both categories.
